snippet: In “The Mortal Instruments,” a new Shadowhunter — part human, part angel — is recruited into the battle to rid New York of demons (and perhaps short shorts).
abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews movie The Mortal Instuments: City of Bones, directed by Harald Zwart; Jamie Campbell Bower and Lily Collins star.
lead_paragraph: In “The Mortal Instruments,” a new Shadowhunter — part human, part angel — is recruited into the battle to rid New York of demons (and perhaps short shorts).

headline.print_headline: Angels and Demons, All Dressed Up for Downtown
headline.seo: In ‘The Mortal Instruments,’ Shadowhunters Prowl New York
headline.main: Angels and Demons, All Dressed Up for Downtown
headline.kicker: Movie Review | ‘The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones'
